original: Åhlström, Carl Erik Rudolf, härads-skrivare, Kisa, f. 7/2/99 i Klock-rike, östergötl. 1., av Rudolf Johansson o. Hanna Åhlström. G. 27 m. Ingegerd Linden. Barn: Gunnel f. 28, Bo-Bertil 31, Anne-Marie 37. — Stud:ex. 19, kanshex. 24. Anst. v. länsstyr. i östergötl. 1. fr. 24, ord. landskont. fr. 32, häradsskriv. i Kin-da o. Ydre fögd. fr. 43.
translated: Åhlström, Carl Erik Rudolf, rural district clerk, Kisa, born on February 7th, 1899 in Klockrike, Östergötland county, son of Rudolf Johansson and Hanna Åhlström. Married on the 27th to Ingegerd Linden. Children: Gunnel, born in 1928, Bo-Bertil, born in 1931, Anne-Marie, born in 1937. Completed high school exams in 1919, clerkship examination in 1924. Employed by the county government in Östergötland county since 1924, became a regular county official in 1932, rural district clerk in Kinda and Ydre districts from 1943 onwards.

employmentHistory.description: Employed by the county government in Östergötland County
Rural district clerk in Kinda and Ydre districts
